data.title: Stirnet
data.text: Sir Philip de Carteret of St. Ouen & Sark (b 1564) m. (1580-1) Rachel Paulet (dau/coheir of George Paulet of Jersey, son of Governor Sir Hugh & brother of Governor Sir Amias) 1. Sir Philip de Carteret of St. Ouen & Sark (b 02.1583/4, d 23.08.1643, Lt. Governor & Bailly of Jersey) this line "the Manorial Branch" m. (1619) Anne Dowse (d 1700, dau of Sir Francis Dowse of Browton & Nether Wallop) A. Sir Philip de Carteret of St. Ouen, Sark & Rozel (d 1662, bailiff of Jersey) The following is supported by TCB (vol 4, p47+) except that it suggests that this Philip probably died in 1672 and was the Philip who was created a baronet in 1670. Provisionally, we support BLG1952 who shows that this Philip died in 1662 so that it must have been his son who was the 1st Bart. m. (1649) Anne Dumaresq (dau of Abraham Dumaresque des Augres) i. Sir Philip de Carteret, 1st Bart of St. Ouen (b 1650, d before 16.11.1693) m. (c04.1676) Elizabeth de Carteret (b 30.12.1663, d 26.03.1717, dau/heir of Sir Edward de Carteret of Trinity by Elizabeth, dau of Robert Johnson of London) a. Sir Charles de Carteret, 2nd Bart of St. Ouen (bpt 04.06.1679, dsp bur 08.06.1715, Bailiff of Jersey) ii. Anne de Carteret (b 1656) B. Francis de Carteret (d 1693, Attorney General of Jersey, 5th son) m. Anne or Amy Seale (dau/heir of Thomas Seale) i. Philip de Carteret of Rozel (b 1672, d 1695) m. Elizabeth Carteret (dau of James Carteret of New Jersey by Frances, dau of Thomas Delaval of New Jersey) a. Philip Edward de Carteret (b 1694, d young) b. Philip de Carteret of Rosel (Rozel) (b 1695-6, dsp) ii. Frances de Carteret (b 1663, d 1738) m. (1681) Elias Dumaresq of Augres iii. Anne de Carteret (b 1664) m. (1679) James Corbet, Vicomte of Jersey a. James Corbet 'of Rozel/ m. Elizabeth Bandinel (dau of George Bandinel) (1) Elizabeth Corbet m. Charles Lempriere iv. De La Riviere de Carteret (b 1667) m. (1685) Daniel Messervy (Attorney General of Jersey) v. Elizabeth de Carteret (b 1669) m. George Bandinel vi.+ other issue - Francis (b 1674, d 1675), Donce (b 1677, d young) C. Thomas de Carteret (Captain in Ireland) m. _ Rockofio (dau of _ Rockofio of Nazaret in Flanders) D. Sir Edward de Carteret (dsp 1698-9) Collins reports that he d 1683 having married Elizabeth, dau of Robert Johnson (alderman of London), but that appears to be confusion with this Sir Edward Carteret. 'Armorial' shows that this Sir Edward married ... m1. Jane Herault m2. (1694) Madelaine (possibly not Ann) Durell E. Margaret de Carteret m. Sir Henry de Vic, 1st Bart F. Anne de Carteret m. Daniel Brevint (Dean of Lincoln) G. Elizabeth de Carteret m. Sir George de Carteret (b 1599, d 13.01.1679) @2@ just below H.+ other issue (dsp) - Peyton (RN), Zouch, Gideon (d 1643), Dowse (d unm) 2. Elias (Helier) de Carteret (b c1585, d 1640, Attorney General of Jersey) this line "the Baronial Branch" m. (1608) Elizabeth Dumaresq (d 1639-40, dau of Hugh Dumaresq of Sark by Collette, dau of John Journeaulx by Isabella, dau/coheir of Henry Mallet of La Malletiere) A. Sir George Carteret of Hawnes (Bedfordshire), 1st Bart of Metesches (b 1599, d 13/14.01.1679/80) m. Elizabeth de Carteret (dau of Sir Philip de Carteret of St. Ouen) @2@ just above i. Sir Philip Carteret (dvp 28.05.1672, Governor of Mount Orgueil) m. (c07.1665) Jemima Montagu (d 1671, dau of Edward Montagu, 1st Earl of Sandwich) a. Sir George Carteret, 1st Baron Carteret of Hawnes (b 07.1667, d 22.09.1695) m. (15.03.1685) Grace Granville, later Countess Granville (b c1667, d 18.10.1744, dau of John Granville, Earl of Bath) (1) John Carteret, 2nd Lord, 1st Earl Granville, Lord Lieutenant of Ireland (b 22.04.1690, d 02.01.1763, 2nd son) m1. (17.10.1710) Frances Worsley (b 06.03.1693/4, d 20.06.1743, dau of Sir Robert Worlsey, 4th Bart) (A) Robert Carteret, 2nd Earl Granville (b 21.09.1721, dsp 13.02.1776) m. Elizabeth (d 29.09.1766) TCP (vol VI, 'Granville', p91) reports that Elizabeth was "said to have been a Frenchwoman". (B) Grace Carteret (b 08.07.1713, d 23.07.1755) m. (22.07.1729) Lionel Tollemache, 4th Earl of Dysart (b 01.05.1708, d 10.03.1770) (C) Louisa Carteret (d 25.12.1736) m. (03.07.1733) Thomas Thynne, 2nd Viscount Weymouth (b 21.05.1710, d 13.01.1751) Their second son assumed the name de Carteret and was created Lord de Carteret of Hawnes. He dsp but the title passed to a nephew. (D) Georgiana Carolina Carteret (d 21/5.08.1780) m1. (14.02.1733-4) John Spencer of Althorp (b 13.05.1708, d 19.06.1746) m2. (01.05.1750) William Cowper, 2nd Earl Cowper (b 13.08.1709, d 18.09.1764) (E) Frances Carteret (d 25.12.1788) m. (24.05.1748) Charles Hay, 4th Marquess of Tweeddale (b c1695, d 09.12.1762) (F)+ other issue (d young) - George, John, Frances m2. (14.04.1744) Sophia Fermor (b 29.05.1721, d 07.10.1745, dau of Thomas Fermor, Earl of Pomfret) (I) Sophia de Carteret (d 05.01.1771) m. (03.02.1765) William Petty Fitzmaurice, 2nd Earl of Shelburne, Marquess of Lansdowne (b 02.05.1737, d 07.05.1805, Prime Minister) (2)+ other issue (d unm) - George (d infant), Philip (b c1691, d 19.03.1710), Jemima b. Philip Carteret (b 1669, dsp 1693, captain) c. Edward Carteret (b 1671, d 1739, of the Middle Temple) m. (1699) Bridget Exton (dau of Sir Thomas Exton, widow of Sir John Sudbury & Sir Thomas Clutterbuck) (1) Isabella Carteret m. Philip Cavendish of Westbury (2)+ other issue - George (d 1718), Edward (d 1731), Philip (d 04.1727), Bridget, Charlotte (d unm 1731) ii. Anne Carteret m. Sir Nicholas Slanning (not Stanning), Bart of Maristow (d 1688) iii. Caroline Carteret m. Sir Thomas Scot of Scot's Hall iv. Louisa Margaret Carteret (dsp) m. Sir Robert Atkins of Saperton v.+ other issue - James (Captain RN), George (d unm 1656), Rachel (d unm), Elizabeth (d unm) B. Philip Carteret of Groville (b c1610, d 1665, Colonel, Bailly of Jersey) m. Mary de la Place (dau/heir of Rev. Elias de la Place of Anneville) i. Elias Carteret (b 1652, d 1720, rector of Cotes (Gloucestershire) & Poole Kenyes (Wiltshire)) m. Mary Hancock of Wiltshire a. Elizabeth Carteret (bpt 19.04.1668, bur 18.09.1751) m. John Le Hardy (Attorney General of Jersey, cousin) b.+ other issue - Elias (b 1675), Robert (b/d 1680), Philip (b 1676), Mary, Louisa, Agnes ii. Elizabeth Carteret (b 1647) m1. Benjamin Dumaresq m2. (1681) Thomas Anquetil iii. Mary Carteret m. Clement Dumaresq iv. Jane Carteret m1/2. Edward Touzel (d before 1693) m2/1. John Le Hardy (bpt 08.03.1667-8) v.+ other issue - Philip (b 1563, dsp), Anne C. Reginald Carteret (b 1623, a 1683) D. Anne Carteret m1. Thomas Seal of Jersey m2. John Nicolle E. Rachel Carteret m. Clement Le Montais of Jersey 3. Rachael de Carteret BE1883 shows that Rachel m1. _ de Beauvoir of Jersey, m2. _ de Vic. BLG1952 shows that she married ... m. Benjamin La Cloche of Longueville 4. Elizabeth de Carteret not mentioned by BE1883 m1. Samuel de Beauvoir m2. John Le Hardy 5. Judith de Carteret m1. Elias Le Montais m2. Sir Brian Johnson of Buckinghamshire 6. Sarah de Carteret probably the Sarah who married ... m. Elias Dumaresq of Vincheles de Bas (b 1581, d 1639)
